languages.text: {n}Слуги и младшие офицеры стоят навытяжку. Похоже, новообретенная светская манера Кибеллы произвела на них неизгладимое впечатление — взгляды устремлены на нее, словно девушка источает незримое, но оттого еще более притягательное сияние.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Слуги и младшие офицеры стоят навытяжку, без единого изъяна в осанке или позе. Кажется, новообретенная светская манера Кибеллы произвела на них неизгладимое впечатление — взгляды устремлены на нее, словно культистка источает незримое, но оттого еще более притягательное сияние.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The servants and junior officers stand at attention. It seems that Kibellah's newfound parlour confidence has made a strong impression on them — all eyes are on her, as though she were emitting some form of invisible yet deeply alluring glow.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слуги и младшие офицеры стоят навытяжку. Похоже, новообретенная светская манера Кибеллы произвела на них неизгладимое впечатление — взгляды устремлены на нее, словно девушка источает незримое, но оттого еще более притягательное сияние.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The servants and the junior officers stand at attention. It seems that Kibellah's newfound parlour confidence has made a strong impression on them — all eyes are on her, as if she emits an unseen yet all the more attractive glow.{/n}

{n}The servants and junior officers stand at attention. It seems that Kibellah's newfound parlour confidence has made a strong impression on them — all eyes are on her, as though she were emitting some form of invisible yet deeply alluring glow.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Diener und niederen Offiziere stehen in Habachtstellung. Kibellahs neues Selbstbewusstsein in feiner Gesellschaft hat offenbar tiefen Eindruck bei ihnen hinterlassen. Alle Augen sind auf sie gerichtet, als würde sie ein unsichtbares, aber zutiefst verlockendes Leuchten ausstrahlen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants and junior officers stand at attention. It seems that Kibellah's newfound parlour confidence has made a strong impression on them — all eyes are on her, as though she were emitting some form of invisible yet deeply alluring glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Diener und niederen Offiziere stehen in Habachtstellung. Kibellahs neues Selbstbewusstsein in feiner Gesellschaft hat offenbar tiefen Eindruck bei ihnen hinterlassen. Alle Augen sind auf sie gerichtet, als würde sie ein unsichtbares, aber zutiefst verlockendes Leuchten ausstrahlen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los sirvientes y los oficiales novatos se cuadran. Parece que la nueva confianza en situaciones sociales de Kibellah les ha impresionado: todas las miradas están puestas en ella, como si emitiera una especie de brillo invisible, pero profundamente atractivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants and junior officers stand at attention. It seems that Kibellah's newfound parlour confidence has made a strong impression on them — all eyes are on her, as though she were emitting some form of invisible yet deeply alluring glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los sirvientes y los oficiales novatos se cuadran. Parece que la nueva confianza en situaciones sociales de Kibellah les ha impresionado: todas las miradas están puestas en ella, como si emitiera una especie de brillo invisible, pero profundamente atractivo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}従者や下級士官たちが整列している。キベラがパーラーで新たに見せつけた振る舞いは、彼らに強い印象を与えたらしい。まるで、目には見えないものの、内面から魅力的な輝きを放っているかのように、全員の視線が集まっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants and junior officers stand at attention. It seems that Kibellah's newfound parlour confidence has made a strong impression on them — all eyes are on her, as though she were emitting some form of invisible yet deeply alluring glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}従者や下級士官たちが整列している。キベラがパーラーで新たに見せつけた振る舞いは、彼らに強い印象を与えたらしい。まるで、目には見えないものの、内面から魅力的な輝きを放っているかのように、全員の視線が集まっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有仆人与低阶军官都立正站好。看起来，绮贝菈充满自信、光彩照人的形象给大家留下了深刻的印象。所有人的目光都集中在她的身上，仿佛她散发着某种看不见，但却无比诱人的光芒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants and junior officers stand at attention. It seems that Kibellah's newfound parlour confidence has made a strong impression on them — all eyes are on her, as though she were emitting some form of invisible yet deeply alluring glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有仆人与低阶军官都立正站好。看起来，绮贝菈充满自信、光彩照人的形象给大家留下了深刻的印象。所有人的目光都集中在她的身上，仿佛她散发着某种看不见，但却无比诱人的光芒。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les serviteurs et sous-officiers se mettent au garde-à-vous. Il semblerait que l'assurance dont fait désormais preuve Kibellah leur ait fait forte impression ; tous les regards sont braqués sur elle, comme si elle émettait une sorte de lueur invisible, mais pour autant profondément séduisante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants and junior officers stand at attention. It seems that Kibellah's newfound parlour confidence has made a strong impression on them — all eyes are on her, as though she were emitting some form of invisible yet deeply alluring glow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les serviteurs et sous-officiers se mettent au garde-à-vous. Il semblerait que l'assurance dont fait désormais preuve Kibellah leur ait fait forte impression ; tous les regards sont braqués sur elle, comme si elle émettait une sorte de lueur invisible, mais pour autant profondément séduisante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmetkârlar ile kıdemsiz subaylar, hazır ol vaziyetinde duruyor. Görünen o ki Kibellah'nın yeni keşfettiği salon öz güveni, üzerlerinde güçlü bir etki bırakmış. Tüm gözler, görünmez olduğu hâlde son derece alımlı bir tür parıltı yayıyormuşçasına Kibellah'nın üzerinde geziniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servants and junior officers stand at attention. It seems that Kibellah's newfound parlour confidence has made a strong impression on them — all eyes are on her, as though she were emitting some form of invisible yet deeply alluring glow.{/n}
